summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Ravenna Boulevard from Brooklyn Avenue to the angle point near Ninth Avenue N.E. et al in the City of Seattle, by grading under Ordinance No. 20436, creating Local Improvement District No. 2031 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
